C

Marks this ProgressMonitor as completed, publishing the final ProgressEvent if necessary.
create() - Static method in class software.leonov.common.progress.ProgressMonitor
Returns a new ProgressMonitor with the minimum and maximum step size set to ProgressMonitor.DEFAULT_MIN_STEP_SIZE and ProgressMonitor.DEFAULT_MAX_STEP_SIZE respectively.

P

progressChanged(ProgressEvent) - Method in interface software.leonov.common.progress.ProgressListener
Receives a progress changed event.
ProgressEvent - Interface in software.leonov.common.progress
A ProgressEvent is used to notify ProgressListeners that the progress has changed.
ProgressListener - Interface in software.leonov.common.progress
A listener interface for handling progress change events.
ProgressMonitor - Class in software.leonov.common.progress
A ProgressMonitor can be used to track the progress of a long running operation.

S
